articles.title: UK business activity strongest since June, led by travel and leisure; prices surge – business live - The Guardian
articles.description: Eurozone growth also booms, as European stock markets are mixed amid rising tensions on the Ukraine-Russia border

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Russian troop withdrawal depends in part on Nato pullback, Belarus says - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: MOSCOW: Belarus said on Monday that the withdrawal of Russian troops from its territory would depend to a large extent on Nato pulling back its forces.
articles.content: Russian troop withdrawal depends in part on Nato pullback, Belarus says

articles.title: Currency markets nervously eye Ukraine headlines, take heart from possible summit - CNA
articles.description:
HONG KONG: Currency markets started the week nervously eying tensions in eastern Europe, with the safe-haven yen not far from a two-week high while the euro was on edge given the energy security and economic implications for Europe of a war in Ukraine.
